subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn will skip this weekend’s World Cup stop at St. Moritz, Switzerland, and is planning to return in a downhill at Val d’Isère, France, on Dec. 21.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn will skip this weekend’s World Cup stop at St. Moritz, Switzerland, and is planning to return in a downhill at Val d’Isère, France, on Dec. 21.
